Room.Name: East Ulandia
Room.ShortDescription: You are traveling on East Ulandia, on the east bank of the Baldywyne River.
Room.LongDescription: Great pepper trees and weeping willows line the bank of the river, and a gentle, grassy slope runds down to the water's edge. On the east side of the road is an open-air market with scores of vendors and milling customers. Gayly colored and brightly striped tents are set up as vending booths, and a number of very strange races can be seen.
